website_summaries.verdict: With deep tread and slight arch support, these shower shoes are a good choice for those who are beyond the college dorm years.
cons: May run small, so consider sizing up when ordering

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Expected!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, these are very comfy, even supportive shower shoes. I was expecting, especially for the inexpensive price, that they would be of a hard material. Instead, they are very cushioned and protective of the feet, extremely comfortable with some support under the arch. I am wearing them now as slippers around the house because I love them so much. They have turned out to be a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Works great but sizing quite off
customer_reviews.text: These run an entire size small. I have larger women’s feet but pretty consistent in my ability to fit between an 8.5 and 9.5. Initially I had ordered the 9-10 and it was too small. Width was great for wide feet but too short. I ordered the 10-11 and now length is great but too wide. I think it’s perhaps a unisex model and that’s why, but if you have narrow feet, this probably wouldn’t be the best option for you.
customer_reviews.author: Happy2Day

customer_reviews.title: Ultra light wide, shirt slide
customer_reviews.text: Extremely light weight, wide slide sandals are very hard to find. These meet those requirements but, as described in other reviews, they run VERY short. I'm a 7D and bought a 7/8 because of the feedback posted. I should have ordered another size up. There is a raised rim around the sandal, and my big toe just hits it. For my purpose, they'll do.
customer_reviews.author: Ikat

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried that these wouldn't fit. I have a fairly wide foot and it always makes me nervous to buy shoes online. I ordered the 10/11 size and am normally a 10w. They fit very well, they aren't snug but have just enough hold to stay on my feet. I haven't had them long enough to comment on the durability, but I suspect if you only wear them for the pool or gym showers, etc. they'll long a good while.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these slides !!! I had been wearing thong strap shower shoes that hurt my feet so these thong-free slides are a great improvement. They are really comfortable ! They have a bit of arch support and feel wonderful. There is a bit of a ridge all around the outside of the sole which results in the shoes holding some water. But when I get ready to step out of the shower I just point my toe down and shake my foot to empty each shoe of most of the water. I highly recommend these shower sandals !!
customer_reviews.author: Lois

customer_reviews.title: perfect shower shoe
customer_reviews.text: This Vertico women's shower shoe is perfect..........I have only used it once. I am so happy that I took the time to read the other buyers messages and reviews of this style because all of them said it was larger than expected. Most of the other buyers said they purchased a size larger as it ran a full size smaller. TRUE........... I wear an 8 1/2 medium in any shoe. Mostly I wear Nurse Mates or Sketchers or Easy Spirit Sandals. Always in an 8 1/2. So after reading other messages I did order the 9-10 size and it is perfect. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: quilter

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight & comfortable
customer_reviews.text: We bought the men's version for my husband, but they were too wide. Saw the womens are exactly the same, but narrower, so we got them to see if they would work. Perfect!!! Lightweight and just what he needed for "hotel slippers."
customer_reviews.author: Amy B

customer_reviews.title: Too small!
customer_reviews.text: I just received these shoes and wore them for the first time at the gym. They are very lightweight, but they are too small for me. I have a normally size 10 foot and ordered the 9-10. My heel hangs off the end and sits on the ridge that should normally fit around your heel and not below it. It is rather uncomfortable to walk in them with that ridge pressing on my heel. I like that they are light and the styling is nice. They need to have a bigger size! I am disappointed! I ended up returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: recommended
customer_reviews.text: My feet are a little narrow, I wear 7.5 usually. These fit fine. I mainly just use them as shower/bathroom slippers which is why I bought them. They're pretty loose on my feet, but it's not an issue. It's not like I'm walking a long time on the beach or anything like that - maybe they would be a little too loose for that, I dunno. I would buy these again. I think this size is good, not sure if I'd go down a size if I were using them for more extensive walking. The material is kind of soft, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Purity is Myth

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Shower Shoe
customer_reviews.text: They arrived promptly. The fit is as expected for an average width foot. The material is waterproof and soft, very comfy! The edges turn up a bit all the way around. This is good because it keeps any little bit of standing water out that may be on the floor of the shower. I bought these for use at my fitness club because I didn't want my feet to have daily exposure to other people foot issues that may be lingering on the floor of the shower. Yuk! These work great for that.
customer_reviews.author: River2u

customer_reviews.title: Liked But Had to Return
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice looking sandal. Your feet are enclosed. I was looking for a pool/shower shoe that would not allow my feet to slide out of or slide off to the side like thong sandals if your feet are wet and soapy. I couldn't get my feet all the way in. My feet are fat, and at the time swollen too! I wear a size 9. These were 9-10 so I thought they would fit. They must run small.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Spears

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, well made, affordable and easy to get on & off.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to wear in the gym locker room and pool area because they looked easier to get on and off than flip flops. I wasn’t expecting much for the price but they have far surpassed my expectations. They are made well; fit well, comfy and easy to get on and off. I have another pair now for camping as well and bought some for my husband. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lyons

customer_reviews.title: These are the most comfortable shoes EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I have RA and my feet hurt me all the time. The day these shoes came in the mail I tried them on and the only time I take them off is at night to sleep. I LOVE THEM!!!! It's like walking on a pillow. My feet aren't hurting me at all. I ordered a second pair for my Sister and she loves them too. I just may have to order a couple more so I have them for when these wear out.....lol
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Greiner

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: I got these to wear around the pool at the gym. They are light, comfortable and "spongy" feeling as I walk. I have not slipped yet. They were inexpensive. They look decent. They fit well. I bought them recently, so I cannot comment on their durability. Bottom line: inexpensive and comfy. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable light weight sandal
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the size 7-8, I normally wear a 7.5 and these fit fine. They seem to be very comfortable and the raised edges allow them to stay in place on your foot. They are very light weight which will make them easy to pack. They are great for around the house wear but I plan to take them to the beach to wear. I am hoping they will be just as comfortable for walking there. Satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Shrink
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to use as shower shoes at my gym. They looked nice and fit well. They were great at first. Then I noticed they were getting tighter and tighter. They shrunk in a few months to where my foot would not go in them and they went in the trash today. I dried them almost daily with warm air from a hairdryer and maybe that caused them to shrink, but no, I would not buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: texasproud

customer_reviews.title: These are fine -- if you have extra extra extra tiny feet
customer_reviews.text: These ran a LOT smaller in size than I expected and are really uncomfortable because of that. The part that's most uncomfortable is that the sandle upper way small so if you have extra tiny feet you'd probably be ok. When I take them off, I have red strap marks indented into the top of my feet and I've never ordered a wide shoe at any point in my life.
customer_reviews.author: S Cole

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and comfortable and just what you need for a pool- I guess they are my slippers too!
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are great! When I get out of the pool soaking wet and head across my bedroom carpet into the bathroom -the water stays inside of the sandal. I can dump it out when I reach the bathroom. They are great on the hot stones. They clean easily. They are very affordable. I buy more so my grandkids can slip them on so they don't' drip all across the wood floors getting to the guest bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Kimpia

customer_reviews.title: It’s very comfortable. I like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: It’s very comfortable. I like it a lot. I am picky about flip flops because I get toe cramps if they don’t fit right. These sandals fit my feet perfectly. In addition, the price is excellent. I usually wear US size 7.5 so I bought these sandals in size 7-8 and they are perfect for my feet, however, if you wear a US size 8, you might want to up a size because I don’t think the size 7-8 will work for US size 8 feet. In addition, I wish the soles have some “drain holes” to drain water away since the sole’s raised edge retains water if you use the sandals in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Hmmm...
customer_reviews.text: It's useful but runs too small even though I ordered a size larger as other reviews suggested. It sticks to the skin so it can be a bit uncomfortable after wearing for a while without socks, and if wet it keeps moisture for a long time between skin and sandal (not a great feeling).
customer_reviews.author: Classic2Day

customer_reviews.title: Not right size for 9-10 US
customer_reviews.text: Product size chart is incorrect on this one. I wear a 9.5 US size. This seller says that is a 40 Euro. Not. this shoe is too short. Should have been a 41, but not worth sending back, so this pair goes to Goodwill. I feel like I wasted my $12. They don't even offer a size 41 in women's, but you can get it on the men's version. It would have been a comfy shoe, but my toes hit the front rim and curl up.
customer_reviews.author: BlueSatin

customer_reviews.title: I wear these everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I bought my husband these sandals and they were perfect. He works from home and wears them every day with little to no wear and tear. I was so impressed I had to buy a pair for myself - now I wear these everywhere both in summer and winter. Great fitting, great feeling sandal.
customer_reviews.author: buballero

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for poolside!
customer_reviews.text: I really love the sandals— just what I wanted to wear around the pool and in the shower! They look nice and feel great— just a bit smaller than I usually prefer, but plenty comfortable! I usually wear a size ten, so if I reorder in the future, to wear on the street, I would go up to the extra large.
customer_reviews.author: T. Blagg

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: These are great pool sandals but sizing is way off. I ordered a size 8-9 women's and got a 39 EU., Which should be correct based on my birks & doc martens, however these are way too small. I'm buying a bigger size and giving these to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Kickboxing mom

customer_reviews.title: A good buy
customer_reviews.text: Over the past few months I have purchased four pairs of plastic shower/pool shoes; all different, but similar in style. I had to return call of the others because of fit issues, so I am especially happy with these shoes. They are sturdy, well made, comfortable and attractive. I fact, they have become my wear-everywhere sandals. There is no doubt that I will buy more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: B. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Did not expect them to be so good
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance and ordered these to wear in the shower while visiting a friend. They are so comfortable, I now wear them as slippers too and expect to other additional pairs. I wear 9 W or 9-1/2 B shoes. I ordered the 9-10 size, and they are perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: AJD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a true size 8 so ordered the 8-9 and the fit is perfect for me. They are a Euro 39, marked on the bottom if that helps. Wide but not too wide. I’m pleasantly surprised at how super comfortable these are, I got them to wear around the pool but I’ll probably wear them more. Super lightweight for travel too.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit, excellent grip, no slipping shower shoes.  Excellent for older people like me.
customer_reviews.text: I love this shower shoe. There's enough clear space for water to get to toes. They will not slide off. I don't worry about slipping in the shower anymore because they are not coming off. When I finish I have to take them off and leave them upside down in the shower to drain. They just stay there.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Clouser

customer_reviews.title: Vertico Slide Ons are great!
customer_reviews.text: These are so amazingly comfortable. I love them so much I re-ordered a second pair for myself and also a pair for my husband. I don't even plan to use these for shower and pool but for everyday around the house cool comfort and amazing to me the Vertico has helped my stability. My balance is not what once it once was so I do appreciate the help with balance. Black is the best color but I do wish they came in a few other colors also.
customer_reviews.author: Sara James

customer_reviews.title: The length was a 6-7 and the width was more like an 8-9
customer_reviews.text: There are not for women with medium width feet. They said they were sized 7-8. The length was a 6-7 and the width was more like an 8-9. These are SHORT and WIDE. Order these only if you have short and wide feet. And if you do, go up one size or your toes will hang over.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Okay water sandal
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely light weight and on the thin side materially. They will be adequate to walk to and from the pool. I ordered a 9/10 and they just fit my size 9 foot so they are not near size 10 in any way. The Kaiback Simple Slide Sport Shower I also ordered is so much better in construction, support, and weight,
customer_reviews.author: RR Medel

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals, but runs a bit small
customer_reviews.text: I think these sandals are great. However, they do run small. I normally wear size 10 women's shoes and ordered these sandals in a women's 10-11, and they just barely fit. I intend to use these sandals as shower shoes at the gym. They are lightweight and very comfortable. There is a lip around the edge of the sandal that contains your foot. If you wear size 11 shoes, I doubt these would fit since I am a size 10 and my heel touches the lip.
customer_reviews.author: an Amazon.com customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly great multipurpose sandal, really comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my wife who now wants another pair. Originally bought just for pool & shower at the gym but she discovered they are great for everyday use including in winter with socks on, the arch support, cushioning and toe room superior to all else while on her feet for long periods. She has a thin (low volume) foot, so we were relieved that they don't come off easily. They are more attractive than most of these types of sandals.
customer_reviews.author: kayakman

customer_reviews.title: It's a comfortable shoe but it runs smaller - I normally get ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a comfortable shoe but it runs smaller - I normally get a size ten which is roomy but this brand runs on the small size - and eleven would have been better but there was no size eleven. I kept the shoe because it was just a bit too small but they are for just around the house. They look good on and if they were just a bit larger I would love them.
customer_reviews.author: JDiet

customer_reviews.title: Great shower/pool shoe for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect shower/pool shoe for the price. When you first start wearing them you will notice little in the way of support, but in a few days of wear they soften up and conform beautifully to your foot. In fact, the foot bed softens up so much that they will probably be a one season shoe. Not a problem for the price.
customer_reviews.author: K. Burns

customer_reviews.title: i love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: i love these shoes. i wear them all the time and they last 6 months and then i can feel the rocks beneath my feet. the first pair i ordered were size 39. the next pair i ordered, size 39, were too small. the return was easy with amazon and i now have a size 40 that fits perfectly. it has good arch support. hope we can continue to get these shoes,,,,, every 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: Great camping/beach flip flops
customer_reviews.text: If you need really good arch support, then skip these. They are fantastic camping and beach shoes. You can slide them on and off very easily, they are waterproof so you can wear them in the shower, and there's a ridge around the circumference that keeps little pebbles and stuff from getting in. They are very comfortable and do not flip off your feet when you walk, even though, for me, they are slightly wide. I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: L. Adams

customer_reviews.title: This fits me fine, but there is not extra room
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 71/2 so I ordered the 7-8. This fits me fine, but there is not extra room. If you are a size 8, I'd order the next size up. The 7-8 size fits a size 7 or 71/2 nicely. Otherwise they are really nice and easy to keep on.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Accumulates Water, Fits Well
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 7.5 in W and have very wide feet. Usually, I struggle finding shoes that aren’t uncomfortable. The 7-8 fit my feet perfectly. My only problem is that the shoes have a curved design that causes water to accumulate in them. Whenever I’m leaving the shower, I have to tilt my whole foot to dump it all out.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Malott

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these before and loved them so I bought a second pair. The quality of the materials had to have changed. I left my sandals on my back patio over the weekend like I had done hundreds of times with my first pair. This time Arizona heat shrank them two sizes too small. This was my second pair so that was a complete surprise since I had the first pair for two years and had left them out many times before. Very disappointed. Will never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bigger would have been better
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 71/2. Ordered 7/8. Bit small. A 9/10 would have been perfect. But hey, I got it to use when I clean my shower. Update: after wearing these a couple days in the house, they stretched and fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Layne Staellie

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and look fine but do run a bit small.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is comfy and I liked the look fine but they do run a bit small. I usually wear a size 9-1/2 or 10 so I ordered a size 9/10. My toes were touching the very end where there is a slight molded edge. I didn't feel like they would be comfortable to wear for a long time but did keep them and gave them to my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Peterson

customer_reviews.title: They need to make these in a larger size
customer_reviews.text: I intend to use these sandals in camp while on an extended backpacking trip, so I wanted something easy to slide on and lightweight. These sandals are perfect on both counts. My only issue with them is the size. I wear a 10B, so I ordered the largest size possible. The width was fine, but they are a shade too short so a couple of my toes go over the edge. This shouldn't be too much of a problem since I won't be wearing them for any great length of time, but I find it annoying. I would have gone up a size if it had been possible, but these were the largest size offered (40).
customer_reviews.author: Gail Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I am happy. I wear a women's 7.5 and these are just slightly too small for me, but since I am only using them in the pool and locker room, I'm not bothered. Fine grip, my feet aren't sliding around. The water does collect in the grooves, but a good shake dries them out enough to be put in my bag!
customer_reviews.author: B. Kitzman

customer_reviews.title: It is the best one I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: It is the best one I've ever had. Packs beautifully and fits perfectly. I measured my foot and followed your sizing directions. I'll be using it a lot when I go to the "Hot Springs in Idaho next week and then when I am back in Florida. Thank you for a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Carole M. Bouchard

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfy and Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I wear 7.5 - 8 (38-39 EUR). Based on reviews, ordered 9-10. Came as EUR 40. Footbed fits fine and is VERY comfortable. But the top part is a little loose with bare feet and non-adjustable. Fits great with regular socks. Can wear barefoot: but I personally wouldn’t walk for very long or far. I like them a lot and would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: VNYCT

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals, great price, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Love these sandals, especially for the price. They are perfect for throwing on to go water plants, run out to the mailbox, go to the pool or the beach etc. I had to exchange for a bigger size and their customer service was fantastic; fast and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna

customer_reviews.title: Great for me!
customer_reviews.text: I have neuropathy pain and swelling in my feet so needed something wide enough to wear without pain. I got three pair, one the next size smaller for when/if my feet aren't swollen, one for gardening and getting dirty and one to keep clean when I have to go somewhere. I am 75 and always had wide feet, but with this swelling these are the greatest thing!
customer_reviews.author: Grace Hatton

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is good but rather wide
customer_reviews.text: Wear a size 8 women shoe so ordered the 8-9 size and thought they were going to be too small but the length was good when I put them on. They are really wide though and so they don't look as attractive as they could but they're soft and comfortable - good for walking on the patio which is what a wanted!
customer_reviews.author: L Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Love these shower shoes
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews, I decided to buy a size up and they fit perfectly! Love these shower shoes.
customer_reviews.author: katleon03

customer_reviews.title: I did not like these when they arrived but did not have time ...
customer_reviews.text: I did not like these when they arrived but did not have time to other shopping before leaving on a trip. They are kind of clunky looking and they do not "pack small," no way to fold them up and one does not fit neatly inside the other. Thus, they can take up a lot of room in your luggage. Nevertheless, I took them on the trip and found them to be comfy and nice for minimizing effects of slick areas in bath or around pool. Now I wear them all the time around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Love This Sandal
customer_reviews.text: I love this sandal! Had to be black and no obvious brand that just takes over the shoe. It's mostly cotton, so comfortable. I have very sensitive skin and my feet have no complaints. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna Kat McDeavitt

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The size (10-11) is just right in length. As I have a narrow foot, they are a bit large across the top (probably a finger''s width between the top of my foot and the sandal top). However, they don't slide off due to the construction of the footbed. They are quite comfortable. I've only been wearing them around the house so far. So I can't evaluate how they serve as shower or pool shoes yet.
customer_reviews.author: Daphne Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Great Pool or Shower Shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are a light weight shoe perfect for travel or poolside. I would not want to be on my feet all day in them as they are not supportive enough for that. I intend to take them to fire camp as a shower shoe and they will work well for this use.
customer_reviews.author: SierraJ

customer_reviews.title: A COMFORTABLE SANDAL!!
customer_reviews.text: These sandals fit perfectly, and are extremely comfortable! They are attractive in appearance, and the non-skid soles provide safety from slipping, by gently gripping any surface. They cup and support my feet as if they were made from my own personal mold. I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Sharyl

customer_reviews.title: Best sandal for wearing to and from the pool.
customer_reviews.text: I wear these sandals when I swim at the Y four days a week. They fit nice, are easy to walk and drive in and are always dry by the next day. And they don't squeak when you walk in them! Not the prettiest sandal but very functional. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: They are a little small - I ordered a 9-10 (I'm a 9.5) but they were still comfortable so I ordered a larger size and plan on giving the smaller ones to my granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: Ann G.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and good price
customer_reviews.text: Soft and very comfy shower shoes. Cheap enough but will last as long as I need them to last. Would recommend as they feel safe to walking around in even when they are wet.
customer_reviews.author: P. Myers

customer_reviews.title: just a tad small, next size up would be too sloppy
customer_reviews.text: I would love to keep these as I think they would be great for the healthclub but just a tad short for my foot. Very comfy otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: dianejmac

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and purpose achieved with these shower shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very cushy and comfortable. The best foot covering I’ve ever worn in the shower. The slightly raised edges of the footbed kept my foot in place and the rubber sole did not slip or slide in the tub from the shower water and soap. I will be sure to take these to the gym when I go.
customer_reviews.author: mklaro

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: These are simple pool slip ons. They don't slip, and the footbed is comfortable. I had ankle surgery, and as I am getting back on my feet, my left foot is still swollen. I needed a pool sandal that wouldn't irritate my still sensitive foot and that was just a bit bigger than my normal shoe size. I normally wear a size 7, so I bought the size 7-8. These feel good on both feet. I will buy another pair in a smaller size when I'm fully recovered.
customer_reviews.author: Diane E Lapostol

customer_reviews.title: Light Weight and Stay On
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight. The design will hold your feet in place, that means, not easy to come off like other slipper, a plus for safety concern. Good to have.
customer_reviews.author: Constance Vannoy

customer_reviews.title: Poolside Slides not so great at Poolside
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased for a trip to a Caribbean Resort. Very comfortable shoe; however, they didn't quite last the entire trip. The cushion part of the sole of the shoe (they are not made with one full sole but a cushioning glued to the sole of the shoe) became unglued and rendered the shoes useless. They were not worn in the water but one would expect they should withstand wet feet. Only lasted 4 days. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Lanaras

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: They are lightweight and comfortable. There is a little "lip" on the back that helps the sandal stay on your foot. Very comfortable and perfect for leaving by the back door to use on when heading outside.
customer_reviews.author: Laura A. Harless

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable from the first day
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are light, flexible and were comfortable from the first day I wore them. The length is perfect, but they are a little wide for my foot. I don't recommend them for outdoor wear because the sole is a little soft on rocky or uneven terrain.
customer_reviews.author: Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Comfee and practical!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pair as a gift because mine are amazing! I originally wanted a shower ready flip flop with top straps that stayed up, rather than collapse, when I slipped them off. I take showers and change in a public gym, so the constant bending over was...well...you get it. I have come to LOVE them! They're comfortable, durable, and the tops don't collapse down when I remove my foot! My showers are much more comfortable now!
customer_reviews.author: Jean-Marc Vlaminck

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a pair I had for over 20 years and thought I would never find another pair as comfortable as the ones I have.....These are that pair - wonderful fit and so comfortable. I live in them in the house - really my slippers and "go to" shoe! Would have no problem wearing shopping. Great price!!! Wish there were more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Clark

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say about a shower sandal, but these feel sturdy and comfortable and worked great in the gym shower. They do seem to run a tad small...I normally wear a 7 (sometimes even a 6.5) and the 7-8 size JUST fit me. One millimeter shorter and my foot would be too long for it. Otherwise, they are quality made and seem like they'll hold up for a while.
customer_reviews.author: S Parish

customer_reviews.title: Good shower slides for gym
customer_reviews.text: Fits my wide feet. Very light weight, dries fast. Does not slip in shower. Would be great if there were holes in sole so water could drain out.
customer_reviews.author: purrl

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are great slip-ons. Since I had read other reviews that said they tend to come a little on the small side, I made sure to order the larger size, so they are fitting well. The rubber/plastic material is soft enough to conform to the top of my foot, so they are snug and don't "slap" the ground like standard flip-flops. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Mintz

customer_reviews.title: Runs really small.
customer_reviews.text: The style and construction of this sandal are good, but it runs very small. I am a 9 1/2 and ordered the size to fit 9-10. It is so small it it unwearable.
customer_reviews.author: neatnik

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I ordered one pair and ordered another pair a week later so I could use one pair at home and one pair at work. I use them at work when I'm at my desk for a long time and don't need my heels on. They are lightweight and roomy. I typically wear a size 8.5 womens and the size 9-10 is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Cricket

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and non slip sole Is a plus.
customer_reviews.text: I just received my sandals, opened the package and put them on immediately. They fit perfect. I normally wear a woman’s 81/2 -9wide so I ordered the women’s 9-10 they are perfect. I walked across my tiled kitchen floor and no slipping/sliding. I will be wearing them often. Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable. I wore them around the gym pool today ...
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfectly. I wear an 8.5 or 9 depending on the shoe so I ordered the one closest to a 9. They are comfortable. I wore them around the gym pool today and they did not feel like slipping. After I wore them in the shower, I just tipped my foot and let water drain off shoe. They are lightweight too.
customer_reviews.author: mbird

customer_reviews.title: shoe
customer_reviews.text: The sandal looks nice like a bath/swim shoe. I ordered my shoe size but, think a 1/2 size bigger would have fit a little better.
customer_reviews.author: DLS2015

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals. They fit great, are comfortable and have good cushioning. I wear them every day and would highly recommend them. Great choice on my part!
customer_reviews.author: Maxine Brand

customer_reviews.title: Why is the size so far off?
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these twice and both times they were way too small. I take an 8 1/2 women’s. I ordered 39 first, way too small, they were probably a 7 1/2. Then i ordered again because i wasn’t allowed to return the first pair. I ordered 9-10 (40), this last time, and they too were way too small. I didn’t order again because of the aggravation of returning, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Riley

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality but a bit too wide.
customer_reviews.text: A bit too wide for me as I have a narrow foot. The actual sandal is well made though.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Great shower/gym shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shower/gym shoe. Non-slip and a great price. I would recommend purchasing one size larger than you usually wear. I wear an 8.5 and I purchased the 8-9 size. My foot fits pretty snug in the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Legend

customer_reviews.title: Fit and Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed at how snug and comfortable these are. The size is spot on and no flopping around when i walk. Not only do they look good but they do the job when it is wet outside.
customer_reviews.author: Dragon Lady

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I have a broken toe and these don't touch the tender spots but keep the toe straight and supported. I know this isn't the typical use for a shoe but these are PERFECT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable, I have been wearing them constantly
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable, I have been wearing them constantly! Run just a tad small, I read the comments and ordered the 9/10 and I always wear a 9 and they fit perfectly. Would definitely be too small for a 10, order up. I don't usually like slides but these are super cute with or without socks. LOVE THEM!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joysjoys

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use as shower shoes when traveling. I don’t like thongs and these were cheap enough to give away when I got home. Not that ugly, lightweight, packed well and were surprisingly comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Elda Grace

customer_reviews.title: I’d buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I love that they can get muddy & it will wash right off. Good For walking the dog in the rain. Most of all...comfortable :))
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Opt for larger size, but very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: More comfortable than expected. I did take other reviewer's advice and opted for the larger size. Im typically a 7.5 & bought the size 8-9- they fit wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Good support
customer_reviews.text: Been ordering this product for several years, very happy with them
customer_reviews.author: William E Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Good shower sandals
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are perfect for use in public showers like the gym. They fit well and dry fast.
customer_reviews.author: DE4619

customer_reviews.title: Great summer slippers
customer_reviews.text: Update: Jan. 2019, Bought a second pair to wear in the shower at the gym. Still use the first pair, good slipper, just slightly compressed. Great extra light summer slipper for hanging around and beachy outings. Ordered them in my size but they're a wee bit smaller than I like but still usable.
customer_reviews.author: HRW

customer_reviews.title: I like that these shoes do not slip on wet floors
customer_reviews.text: I like that these shoes do not slip on wet floors, but when I shower the water puddles in them and can't run out. They do the job.
customer_reviews.author: genealover

customer_reviews.title: These do run small
customer_reviews.text: Upon reading other reviews prior to purchase, I saw the size 8-9 is actually a size 39. I ordered this size, as I wear a size 39 in Birkenstock. These are about a half size smaller than my Birks. They are very comfortable but if they were a 1/4" smaller I would have to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: True to picture
customer_reviews.text: Fits well. Use them for around the house and taking out the trash.
customer_reviews.author: TULA

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shoes to use for showers at the gym. They are so comfortable and inexpensive, I am ordering another pair to wear about the house.
customer_reviews.author: True Blue

customer_reviews.title: Nice for Beach Wear
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight. Durable. Cleans of easily. Nice thick sole.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Super functional pool/shower shoes
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, flexible, and sturdy. Very slight concave shape (when new) and the low raised edge around the sole could contribute to a feeling of snugness at the big/second toe, but there is plenty of height beneath the instep straps. If you are in doubt, order the larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Miles Denham

customer_reviews.title: Order A Size Up
customer_reviews.text: These are great to take to the gym and the pool without having to walk on the nasty floors. They dry quickly and are comfortable. Like other reviewers have stated, the size runs smaller. I take a size nine and ordered size 10/11 and they fit perfectly. Definitely order a size up.
customer_reviews.author: Beagle Mom

customer_reviews.title: An excellent waterproof slide.
customer_reviews.text: Quick service. Not a comfort sandal, but perfect for my need, which was for a waterproof sandal to run into the garden and water. I'm always ruining my good sandals by getting them soaked.
customer_reviews.author: MLM

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals for its price
customer_reviews.text: Great sandals for its price, but I'd recommend ordering one size up especially if you're in-between sizes. My size is normally 8.5-9, and the 9-10 I ordered barely fits me. A 10-11 might still be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Wei

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have owned a pair of these flip flops for about 2 years now. I initially bought them to shower at the gym, but then I started wearing them at home. They are ugly looking but the most comfortable shoes to wear at home.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Avalos

customer_reviews.title: Comfory!
customer_reviews.text: It is good that i do not have to tie up my shoes. Just slip in then go outside for short time.
customer_reviews.author: CelMEM

customer_reviews.title: Slip on and off easily with these cool sandals!
customer_reviews.text: Great pool or shower shoes. I took these to Japan to use at the hot springs and they were wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Vertico Women's Shower and Pool Sandal - Slide On
feature_bullets: Sandals Pack Tight and Small for your Luggage or Gym Bag
